attributes.action: recognize and support Wafa Sultan's battle against Islamic extremeism. We need more people like her to be known and have their voices heard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wafa Sultan is famous for attacking Islamic extremism and working to combat it. Videos of her work are on YouTube and she has recieved lots of praise and awards. She has even received death threats for her work but battles on regardless. A Truely inspring woman who the British Government should really be supporting.
